sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
   div.block
      div.art
         a(:href='photo.user.links.html' target="_blank")
          div.ava(:style="{ 'background-image': 'url(' + photo.user.profile_image.small + ')' }")
         div.name
            a(:href='photo.user.links.html' target="_blank" style="color:#333333; text-decoration:none; font-weight: bold") {{photo.user.first_name}} {{photo.user.last_name}}
            a(:href='photo.user.links.html' target="_blank" style="color:#8D8D8D; text-decoration:none;") @{{photo.user.username}}
      img.pic(:src= "photo.urls.regular" :alt="photo.alt_description")
      //div.pic(:style="{ 'background-image': 'url(' + photo.urls.regular + ')' }")
      div.counter
       span {{stats.views && stats.views.total}}
       include ../assets/Eye.svg
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'Photo',
  data () {
    return {
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    this.$store.dispatch('getStat', this.photo.id)
  },
  methods: {
  },
  computed: {
    stats () {
      return this.$store.getters.getStat(this.photo.id) || {}
    }
  },
  props: [
    'photo'
  ]
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
 main {
       width: 1000px;
       height: max-content;
       margin: auto;
  }
  a {
   font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;
   font-size: 12px;
   line-height: 14px;
  }
  .block {
     width: 320px;
     height: 312px;
  }
  .art {
    display: grid;
    width: 225px;
    height: 50px;
    align-items: center;
    grid-template-columns: 40px 180px;
    grid-column-gap: 10px;
    padding-left:10px ;
  }
.ava{
   width: 30px;
   height: 30px;
   border-radius: 50%;
   background-color: black;
}
.name{
    display: grid;
}
.counter{
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    padding: 10px 10px;
    align-items: center;
    span {
        margin-right: 5px;
    }
}
.pic{
   width: 320px;
   height: 230px;
   object-fit: cover;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 480px){
   main {
     width: 480px;
   }
   .wrapper {
     width: 480px;
     grid-template-columns: repeat(1, 440px);
     padding-left: 20px;
  }
  .block {
    width: 440px;
    height: 380px;
  }
  .pic {
    width: 440px;
    height: 300px;
  }
 }
</style>
